name: Andoria
headline: Automate any manual and repetitive tasks on the web
description: No more brittle RPAs – Andoria is the most intuitive platform for enterprises to build intelligent process automations for any manual and repetitive tasks. Unlike traditional RPA that easily breaks, Andoria can handle unstructured data, complex decision-making, and adapt to software changes.

founders.name: Daryl Budiman, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder @ Andoria. Previously Founding Team @ MultiOn & Stanford

# The Agentic Workflow Platform
## The platform for enterprise leaders to automate low-level manual and repetitive work and give their teams their time back.
# A TEAM FROM WORLD CLASS INSTITUTIONS
# A TEAM FROM WORLD CLASS INSTITUTIONS
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/dgnaP6c6dWCEDdedQohzqD64.svg)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/dgnaP6c6dWCEDdedQohzqD64.svg)
# Intelligent automation. No more brittle RPAs.
# Intelligent automation. No more brittle RPAs.
# We built enterprise-level agentic process automation that can handle unstructured data, complex decision-making, and adaptability to process changes.
# We built enterprise-level agentic process automation that can handle unstructured data, complex decision-making, and adaptability to process changes.
### No code required
Andoria uses the web just how a human would, hence not requiring any application and API integrations. There is no code involved to run Andoria.
### Use any application
Whether your team uses 1 or 100 applications, Andoria agents can interact with any application–no further setup required.
### Delegate while you sleep
Andoria agents can work autonomously, even when you're away from your computer–so you can focus on things that matter most.
# Built for the enterprise.Custom and secure agents for your team's needs.
# Built for the enterprise.Custom and secure agents for your team's needs.
# Agents both secure and adaptable for any use case. We provide enterprise-level customization to ensure that our agents work for your team's needs.
# Agents both secure and adaptable for any use case. We provide enterprise-level customization to ensure that our agents work for your team's needs.
### Compliance
Andoria is SOC 2 Type I compliant. We are able to do on-prem deployments on request.
### Customization
Our team can design and build custom solutions for your team's needs.

generated_description:
**Andoria - Revolutionizing Automation for Enterprises**

Founded in 2024 and nestled in the heart of San Francisco, Andoria is a cutting-edge tech startup that's redefining how enterprises automate their processes. Part of the illustrious Y Combinator Batch F24, Andoria aims to liberate teams from the shackles of manual work, tackling the tedious and repetitive tasks that can bog down productivity.

**Mission and Unique Value Proposition**

At its core, Andoria’s mission is straightforward: automate any manual and repetitive tasks on the web. What sets Andoria apart is its focus on creating what they call "intelligent process automations" that can handle unstructured data and complex decision-making—something that traditional robotic process automation (RPA) often struggles with. Forget about brittle systems that break at the slightest change; Andoria's platform is designed to adapt seamlessly to software changes.

**How It Works**

Unlike traditional automation solutions that require extensive coding and setup, Andoria’s platform operates just like a human would on the web. It works with any application—whether you’re using a handful or a hundred—without the need for intricate integrations. The beauty of it? There’s no coding required, which means anyone can deploy these automations without needing a technical background. Andoria's agents can even work autonomously while you’re away, ensuring that your tasks continue to get done while you focus on higher-level priorities.

**Enterprise-Ready and Customizable**

Andoria positions itself as an enterprise-friendly solution with customizable agents tailored to meet the specific needs of every team. The platform is not just secure—it’s SOC 2 Type I compliant. For organizations that require extra layers of security or custom solutions, Andoria is ready to deploy on-prem, ensuring that companies can comply with their internal policies and regulations.

**What's Next?**

With a lean team of just two employees, Andoria is poised for growth, reflecting a typical startup ethos: start small, think big. Led by a group partner from Y Combinator, Diana Hu, Andoria is a player to watch in the generative AI and enterprise automation space.

Whether you're an enterprise looking to reclaim your team's time or an individual curious about how to streamline workflows, Andoria promises an intuitive approach to automation that could well change how work gets done. 

For more details, you can visit their website at [Andoria.ai](https://andoria.ai/) or book a demo to see the platform in action. The future of work, it seems, is just a few clicks away.
